Module edu.ntnu.idatt1002.sysdev_k1_05_ets
Package edu.ntnu.idatt1002.sysdev_k1_05_ets.readersAndWriters

Class TournamentReader

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idatt1002.sysdev_k1_05_ets.readersAndWriters.TournamentReader
public class TournamentReader extends Object
Class for reading tournament file to tournament objects, as well as managing file location.

  • Method Details

    • readTournamentFromFile

      public static Tournament readTournamentFromFile(String tournamentName) throws IOException
      Reads all available info from tournament file to tournament Method can read tournament even without teams and matches listed. Method only reads for teams if file size suggests so, and will only read for matches if teams have been added.
      Parameters:
      tournamentName - name of the tournament
      Returns:
      Tournament, if the tournament exists.
      Throws:
      IOException - if tournament file does not exist, or if file could not be read

    • readThroughOngoingTournaments

      public static ArrayList<String> readThroughOngoingTournaments() throws FileNotFoundException
      Method for reading through the ongoing overview and returning tournament names in the file.
      Returns:
      List of tournament names in overview.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if file does not exist

    • readThroughPreviousTournaments

      public static ArrayList<String> readThroughPreviousTournaments() throws FileNotFoundException
      Method for reading through the previous overview and returning tournament names in the file.
      Returns:
      List of tournament names in overview.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if file does not exist

    • readThroughUpcomingTournaments

      public static ArrayList<String> readThroughUpcomingTournaments() throws FileNotFoundException
      Method for reading through the upcoming overview and returning tournament names in the file.
      Returns:
      List of tournament names in overview.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if file does not exist

    • isTournamentStillUpcoming

      public static boolean isTournamentStillUpcoming(File file) throws IOException
      Method checks if the given tournament is still an "upcoming" tournament
      Parameters:
      file - file of the potentially upcoming tournament
      Returns:
      true if still upcoming, false if not
      Throws:
      IOException - if file could not be read

    • isTournamentStillOngoing

      public static boolean isTournamentStillOngoing(File file) throws IOException
      Method checks if the given tournament is still an "ongoing" tournament
      Parameters:
      file - file of the potentially ongoing tournament
      Returns:
      true if still ongoing, false if not
      Throws:
      IOException - if file could not be read

    • readAllOngoingTournamentsToList

      public static ArrayList<Tournament> readAllOngoingTournamentsToList(int n) throws IOException
      Method for reading all tournaments in the ongoing overview to a list of tournaments
      Parameters:
      n - Number of tournaments from the ongoing overview that you want returned, if 0, it will return all
      Returns:
      List of ongoing tournaments
      Throws:
      IOException - if overview file could not be read.

    • readAllUpcomingTournamentsToList

      public static ArrayList<Tournament> readAllUpcomingTournamentsToList(int n) throws IOException
      Method for reading all tournaments in the upcoming overview to a list of tournaments
      Parameters:
      n - Number of tournaments from the upcoming overview that you want returned, if 0, it will return all
      Returns:
      List of upcoming tournaments
      Throws:
      IOException - if overview file could not be read.

    • readAllPreviousTournamentsToList

      public static ArrayList<Tournament> readAllPreviousTournamentsToList(int n) throws IOException
      Method for reading all tournaments in the previous overview to a list of tournaments
      Parameters:
      n - Number of tournaments from the previous overview that you want returned, if 0, it will return all
      Returns:
      List of previous tournaments
      Throws:
      IOException - if overview file could not be read.
